top_comments.comment: The terraforming contrasts very nicely with the Octagon. I didn’t think of snow until you mentioned it. It’s at it’s awkward stage that all art goes through. The coral will bring it to life …or death really.
That intro song never gets old

comments_since_last_sample.body:
It's not snow - It's the Ashes of people who didn't payed in the barrel.

#PayInTheBarrel

Just by the name alone and the first minute or so. I knew exactly what this vid was all about. 🤣
Should have put a #PayInTheBarrel sign on the Octagon signs.
From what I can tell it's not the signs the other hermits aren't seeing, it's the actual barrels ;) With signs plastered all over them they're kind of well hidden.

Wouldn't it be cool to have a flying obstacle course around octagon island, but instead of passing through circular rings you'd pass through octagonal ones. Doc could even make redstone that wirelessly checks if players passed through each ring and automatically records the fastest time(s) in something like a leaderboard.
